data.title: Is Robert Redford still alive? Why you don't hear from the actor anymore
data.meta_description: If you are asking yourself, is Robert Redford still alive? The actor is alive and still active in the film industry. Read on to find out more about his life.
data.text:
If you love old-school movies, you might have seen classics like Butch Cassidy And The Sundance Kid and Barefoot in the Park. These movies received critical acclaim thanks to their stellar cast. Among the stars in the films was American actor Robert Redford. He is known for his charisma, which has made him a fan favourite. However, he has disappeared from the limelight for quite a while, leaving many wondering, "Is Robert Redford still alive?".

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Profile summary

Is Robert Redford still alive?

Is Robert Redford still alive, and if so, how old is he?

He announced his retirement as an actor in 2018

He unexpectedly returned to an existing role

He steps back from the Sundance Film Festival spotlight

What's going on with Robert Redford in 2024?

As a producer

As a director

Who is Robert Redford's partner?

How did Robert Redford lose his sons?

What is Robert Redford's net worth?

What illness does Robert Redford have?

Quick facts about Robert Redford

Charles Robert Redford Jr is an actor and filmmaker from the United States. He has received numerous honours, including an Academy Award, a British Academy Film Award, two Golden Globe Awards, the Cecil B. DeMille Award, and the Presidential Medal of Freedom. In addition, Time magazine named him one of the world's 100 most influential people in 2014.

Profile summary

Full nameCharles Robert Redford JrGenderMaleDate of birth18 August 1936Age87 years old (as of 2024)Zodiac signLeoPlace of birthSanta Monica, California, U.S.ACurrent residenceUtah, USANationalityAmericanEthnicityMixedReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHeight5'10" (179 cm)Weight169 (77 kgs)Hair colourBlondeEye colourBlueMotherMartha Woodruff RedfordFatherCharles Robert RedfordMarital statusMarriedWifeSibylle Szaggars (m. 2009)Children4SchoolVan Nuys High SchoolCollegeUniversity of Colorado Boulder Pratt Institute, American Academy of Dramatic ArtsProfessionActor, filmmakerNet worth$200 million

Is Robert Redford still alive?

His absence in the scene has led to curiosity about his whereabouts. So, why isn't the actor heard from anymore? And what is Robert Redford doing these days? Here is what you need to know about him.

Is Robert Redford still alive, and if so, how old is he?

The American actor and filmmaker is still alive. He celebrated his 87th birthday on 18 August 2023.

He announced his retirement as an actor in 2018

The Academy Award winner announced his retirement from acting during an interview in 2018. Robert Redford told CBS News that his role in the film The Old Man and the Gun was his final.

He stated that his retirement was due to age and that he had been in the industry since he was 21. He also added that he was only retiring from acting and not from the industry entirely.

Redford revealed during a red-carpet interview just one month after announcing his retirement from acting that his decision was not final. According to Variety, when asked about his retirement, the actor stated that his announcement was a mistake and that he should not have said anything about it.

Robert stated that if he were to retire, he would do so quietly because making an announcement would draw too much attention.

He unexpectedly returned to an existing role

A year after The Old Man and the Gun was released, Redford made a surprise cameo in 2019. He also voiced the comedy film Omniboat: A Fast Boat Fantasia.

According to his IMDb profile, the actor boasts a film and TV series resume with 83 appearances. Some of his acting credits include:

YearFilm/TV seriesRole2020Omniboat: A Fast Boat FantasiaLokia the Dolphin Monster (Voice)2019Avengers: EndgameAlexander Pierce2018Buttons, A New Musical FilmNarrator (Voice)2018The Old Man & the GunForrest Tucker2017Our Souls at NightLouis Waters2017ArenaNarrator (Voice)2017The DiscoveryThomas2016Pete's DragonMeacham2016One More ChanceRobert Redford2015TruthDan Rather

He steps back from the Sundance Film Festival spotlight

In January 2019, Redford announced that he would no longer be involved in the Sundance Film Festival in the same capacity. He announced his departure from the spotlight at the Sundance Film Festival but provided little explanation for his decision.

What's going on with Robert Redford in 2024?

He is still producing and directing. In interviews about his retirement from acting, Robert has stated that he is still interested in directing. He has 56 productions and 10 directorial credits. Some of his recent works include:

As a producer

YearFilm/TV series2023All Illusions Must Be Broken2022Dark Winds2014-2020Death Row Stories2020Public Trust2020The Mustangs: America's Wild Horses2019The Mustang2018The Old Man & the Gun2018Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché2018Momentum Generation2017American Epic

As a director

YearFilm/TV series2014Cathedrals of Culture2012The Company You Keep2010The Conspirator2007Lions for Lambs2000The Legend of Bagger Vance1998The Horse Whisperer1994Quiz Show1992A River Runs Through It1998The Milagro Beanfield War1980Ordinary People

Who is Robert Redford's partner?

Robert is married to Sibylle Szaggars. They got married in July 2009 in Hamburg, Germany. Robert Redford's partner is a German-born multimedia environmental artist. Her artistic work includes painting with oil and taking pictures during her trips to Morocco.

Robert Redford was previously married to Lola Van Wagenen in Las Vegas. They had four children:

Scott Anthony Redford (1 September 1959 – 17 November 1959)

Shauna Jean Redford (born 15 November 1960)

David James Redford (5 May 1962 – 16 October 2020)

Amy Hart Redford (born 22 October 1970)

How did Robert Redford lose his sons?

Robert has lost two kids. His son Scott Redford tragically passed away from sudden infant death syndrome at the tender age of 2 and a half months. He is buried at Provo City Cemetery in Provo, Utah.

His other son, David James, died on 16 October 2020 after battling liver disease for thirty years. James was a documentary filmmaker and environmentalist. In 1993, he underwent two liver transplants to combat the effects of primary sclerosing cholangitis (PSC).

However, the disease returned in 2018, turning cancerous as he awaited a liver transplant in 2019. According to Cindi Berger, Robert Redford's publicist, the actor mourned with his family following the loss.

What is Robert Redford's net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, the actor has an estimated net worth of $200 million. His earnings result from a long and successful career in the film and television industries.

What illness does Robert Redford have?

Currently, the actor has no known illnesses. However, Robert had polio as a child. According to Grunge, the actor contracted the disease after swimming in the ocean. He said that, despite being mild, the polio was severe enough to keep him in bed for two weeks.

Quick facts about Robert Redford

He began his television career began in 1960.

He made his directorial film debut with Ordinary People in 1980.

He has a paternal half-brother, William.

He is of English, Scottish, and Irish ethnicity.

He was classmates with baseball pitcher Don Drysdale.

He studied painting at the Pratt Institute in Brooklyn.

He is the co-owner of Wildwood Enterprises, Inc.

He is the president and co-founder of Sundance Productions with Laura Michalchyshyn.

Is Robert Redford still alive? Yes, the actor is still alive and well. His absence from the big screen has piqued fans' interest, who are wondering what he is unto nowadays.

Yen.com.gh wrote an intriguing story about bodybuilder Bostin Loyd. He was an American professional bodybuilder who rose to prominence after admitting to using steroids. Unfortunately, Bostin died of a heart attack in February 2022 at 29.

What became of the bodybuilder? Did his use of steroids contribute to his death? In this intriguing read, find out what happened to Bostin Loyd.

Source: YEN.com.gh
